[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-api-tester/src/tokenv1_client.rs] [General] [Pending transaction tracking] Does the code track pending transactions to prevent reusing sequence numbers while transactions are in-flight? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-api-tester/src/tokenv1_client.rs] [General] [Handle caching] Are table handles cached, and if so, can stale handles cause transactions to access outdated data structures? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-api-tester/src/tokenv1_client.rs] [Function: create_collection()] [Description size] Can extremely large description fields cause memory exhaustion during transaction building or API processing? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-api-tester/src/tokenv1_client.rs] [Function: create_token()] [Property arrays] Even though property arrays are empty, can future additions allow unbounded array sizes causing DoS? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-api-tester/src/tokenv1_client.rs] [Function: create_token()] [Royalty gaming] Can creators set royalty rates just below 100% to effectively steal all value during transfers while technically being valid? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-api-tester/src/tokenv1_client.rs] [Function: offer_token()] [Griefing attack] Can attackers create many offers they never claim, forcing recipients to pay gas to decline offers? (Low)
